parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Skips all loop interations.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[break]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 0 [[to]] 3 [[do]] 
{
    [[if]] (_i [[a == b|==]] 2) [[then]] {[[break]]}; 
    [[systemChat]] [[str]] _i;
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[continueWith]] [[continue]] [[breakWith]] [[breakOut]]
</value></part></template></root>
